tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Prof. Rosen is the most helpful professor I have EVER had. Her comments are super clear and thoughtful, and she will take the extra time to really help you get better on every single paper. Made me a better writer and also more analytical in my work. Hands down my favorite professor so far.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Rosen is a great professor, some people find her intro class monotonous but the material is very engaging. She is extremely helpful during office hours and is very attractive. Leggoo.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She was a good teacher. loved her lectures. don\'t have to go to class but you should since her exams are half about textbook and half about lectures. class is based off of 3 exams. only thing is you do have to wait awhile to get test grades back.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Had her for Legal Analysis last semester. Found her to be fairly tough but very fair. Somewhat short with students in class but is more patient and understanding during office hours and meetings. Gives out homework and pop quizzes to the point where it feels like an undergrad course. Hot is a gross understatement when describing her looks.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Prof. Rosen can seem a little cold when you\'re up close and personal as in her office hours. In class she\'s a decent lecturer. Tests can have both trick and easy questions so make no assumptions. May pelt you with busywork if you are in her Legal Analysis class.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I absolutely loved Prof.Rosen as well as her class. Her lectures were engaging and she had a great sense of humor. I personally found her to be an incredible female role model. She is completely fair on her tests and throws out questions that didn\'t make sense as well as curves grades. I very much recommend both this course and Prof. Rosen.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Professor Rosen was very lenient on exams and curved all of them. She posted almost all of her lecture slides online, so attending class was not necessary. Be sure to read the books and ask questions, as she is very helpful.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: good teacher, her tests can be difficult if you do not go to class or do the reading, as she pulls information from both the book and lectures for the test. There is not a lot of homeowrk, jsut reading, your grade is based on 3 tests.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: If you do the work you will get a good grade. She expects you to work.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
